news_header: Queen Can of Britain does not use modern smartphones and relies on a classic Nokia 3310.
news_text: Queen Can, aged 77, has no contact with her family via WhatsApp and still uses a Nokia 3310, which only allows phone calls and text messages. Her son, Tom Barker Bowles, mentioned that she is too busy to stay in touch with her mother and has missed seeing her grandchildren's phones. There is limited information available about the use of British phones due to security reasons.
